EmailTemplate.name: Accounts Payable
EmailTemplate.subject: Supplier Phone Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Supplier phone calls Please advise the supplier that due to COVID-19 restrictions we need to communicate via email.
Content of email:
Supplier name
Supplier email
Branch referring to
[maybe multiple and hence the State of Australia referring to â€“ something to try and identify which branch we may need to communicate with]
Short detail of query
[such as following up on payment, requesting email address to send invoices to, etc.]
